title.rendered: Laureate of the 2015 European Convergences Awards

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fullwidth=”on” specialty=”off” admin_label=”Section”][et_pb_fullwidth_header admin_label=”En-tête plein écran” title=”Tutorat Passeport Avenir ” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” header_fullscreen=”off” header_scroll_down=”off” background_color=”#313f55″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” content_orientation=”center” image_orientation=”center” title_font_color=”#ffffff” title_font=”|on|||” title_font_size=”45px” custom_button_one=”off” button_one_letter_spacing=”0″ button_one_use_icon=”default” button_one_icon_placement=”right” button_one_on_hover=”on” button_one_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ custom_button_two=”off” button_two_letter_spacing=”0″ button_two_use_icon=”default” button_two_icon_placement=”right” button_two_on_hover=”on” button_two_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Passeport Avenir is an association which assist, with tutor and voluntary framework from the business world, young people from modest backgrounds in their academic and professional career. With the cooperation of the Accenture Fondation, the projet aims to emerge a new generation of leaders, as an example of success and diversity.

More informations

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
